about_the_game:
Cold Blood Future Pass

Experience the future of warfare with the Cold Blood Future Pass, a battle pass featuring new characters, weapons, and cosmetics developed with cutting-edge Metahuman technology.

New Characters

The Cold Blood Future Pass introduces four new characters, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles:

Jane
Ryan
Peer
Maya
Metahuman Technology

The Cold Blood Future Pass is the first battle pass to feature characters developed with Metahuman technology, Epic Games' next-generation facial animation system. This allows for unprecedented levels of realism and emotion in the game's characters.

Battle Pass Rewards

In addition to the new characters, the Cold Blood Future Pass also features a variety of other rewards, including:

New weapons, including the Cold Blood assault rifle and the Frostbite sniper rifle.
New cosmetics, including character skins, weapon skins, and emotes.
Exclusive battle pass challenges and rewards.
Season Pass

The Cold Blood Future Pass is available as a season pass, which gives you access to all of the rewards immediately. You can also purchase individual rewards from the battle pass store.

Get ready to experience the future of warfare with the Cold Blood Future Pass!

Additional Details About the New Characters

Jane: Jane is a highly trained assassin with superhuman abilities. She can teleport short distances and become invisible to the naked eye. This makes her ideal for flanking the enemy and taking them out by surprise.
Ryan: Ryan is a cybernetically enhanced soldier with superhuman strength and speed. He is also equipped with a variety of high-tech weapons and gadgets. Ryan is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield, and he can easily take down multiple enemies at once.
Peer: Peer is a brilliant hacker who can control the battlefield with drones and turrets. He can also use his hacking abilities to disable enemy traps and equipment. Peer is a valuable asset to any team, and he can provide his teammates with a significant tactical advantage.
Maya: Maya is a mystical healer with the ability to revive teammates and boost their abilities. She can also use her healing magic to protect herself and her teammates from damage. Maya is an essential member of any team, and she can turn the tide of battle in an instant.
We hope you enjoy the Cold Blood Future Pass and the new characters that it introduces!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3 or Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 or Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 Super
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: The Cold Blood Future Pass is the future of warfare, featuring new characters, weapons, and cosmetics developed with cutting-edge Metahuman technology. Metahuman allows for unprecedented levels of realism and emotion in video game characters. This season's battle pass includes Jane, Ryan, Maya, Peer
